Text.Page:
[Dougal's Letter]

Greetings, !
After hearing many stories of your heroism, I could not wait to write this letter.
I know just the place for heroes like you.
Find me at Highwatch, if you're interested.

There are no doubts about your skill and courage.
I believe you are qualified.

Arborea's bravest have gathered to renovate an abandoned arena... a little haven for showing off their skills.
Don't bother thinking about fighting against your own federation allies.

It's a privilege not many people get to experience... a chance to demonstrate your prowess. Fraywind Canyon is the place to exercise that privilege... a place for competing against other brave soldiers!

Doesn't your heart start to pound at the thought?
Are you willing to give it a try?

I knew you'd enjoy it!
Any champion craving power would not pass up an opportunity like this.

But Fraywind Canyon is filled with passionate warriors, so the battles fought there are contested with great intensity. You should prepare well before you enter.

Take this book with you. Consider it a welcome gift. Study it well. I'm sure it will be a great help for you in this and many other arenas.
